posts.post_content:
Hi guys.

I am looking for an upgrade on my Uzit Hughie Jennings "both hands". 

It is an attractive and presentable example, though it does have a crease.

If you have another Uzit HOF, or Hal Chase with the loving cup, I would be interested in a trade and sending cash back your way for the upgrade.

If anyone has a match and they would like to discuss, please send me a PM.

Thank you very much.

Derek
